1.title: First Choice

11.content: Now which one do you want to fatten up?
11.title: Alvin, Simon, or Theodore?

111.content:
(I've edited this chapter because I felt that I rushed into the weight gain without enough detail and I hate when that happens)

One Theodore Seville was walking home from the Rec. Center near his house. The chubby 9-year old chipmunk was practically bouncing with joy and had a large beaming smile on his face. He'd just had his first baking lesson and was overjoyed at being able to learn how to cook wonderful, delicious new sweets.

'I might even be able to make that special cake for Dave's birthday," he thought. For you see, Theodore had planned to make Dave his triple-ultra-super-whammy chocolate fudge cake for his birthday which was in two weeks, the recipe was very hard however and he hoped that these baking classes would give him the skill necessary to make the cake.

Of course, the thing about triple-ultra-super-whammy chocolate fudge cake was that it looked exactly the same ruined or not, so one would be able to tell the difference unless they ate it. If it was wrong, then it wouldn't taste the same. It'd be all right, but one could tell that it was missing something. And, there was also the fact that unless perfectly made, the cake itself would contain a LOT of empty calories. In fact, since Theodore always made a huge cake with at least 8 slices and since each slice had at least 500 calories, it was a real diet killer.

Unfortunately, Theodore decided to ignore this fact and had instead decided to think about who would help him eat the cakes every time he made a mistake, which he was sure he would.

'I can't ask Eleanor, she and her sisters are grounding until Dave's birthday because of Brittany. And Simon won't be much help, since he doesn't enjoy chocolate that much. I guess that leaves...'

"How ya doing Theodore!" asked Alvin, Theodore's older brother.

"Alvin..." he whispered. 'Of course, Alvin's perfect. He's not one to turn down a free chocolate cake,' he thought.

"What about me?" Alvin asked. "Um...I just wanted to know if you could do me a favor Alvin. Could help me test my cakes for Dave's birthday? I'd need someone to help me eat them and tell if it's good or not. I mean, you don't hafta, it's okay if you don't wanna because I know that you have other things to do and I wouldn't want to bother you and then you also have..."

"Whoa! Slow down Theodore, of course I'll help you! After all, it's chocolate! And what kid would turn down chocolate."

"Really! Thanks Alvin! Here, let me start the oven up, we can start right now!" exclaimed Theodore as he started gathering the necessary ingredients required. "I hope we get it right!"

2 hours later though, after having each 4 slices, which is 2,000 calories each, the cake was deamed a failure. They both left the table however, a little heavier than before.

Later that night...

"Hey Alvin, are you okay if we made two cakes a day, and maybe a third one on the weekends?"

*Yawn* "Sure Theodore, whatever you say. I'm sleepy from all that cake." said an exhausted Alvin."

*Yawn* "Me too. Good night Alvin."

"Good night Theodore."

Note: Currently, it's Monday. Also, it takes 3,500 calories to make 1 pound. As of right now, I'm making Alvin about 90lbs. and Theodore about 100lbs.
111.title: Cooking Classes

1111.content:
The following day, Alvin awoke feeling much better and excited to have some more cake! He made his way into the kitchen, where Theodore was making breakfast. "Theo? What are you doing? Where's Dave?"

"Nah, he, Simon, and the girls left early this morning. They will be back in a few days, there was a problem with grandma or something like that. Anyway, I told him that I needed to stay and that I needef your help."

"Really? Awesome! No rules for the next few days? I call the videogames!", Alvin exclaimed.

"Fine, but eat your breakfast first. I also baked another cake, so you can have some with your breakfast.", Theo said, with an eye roll.

Alvin hooted. Cake with breakfast? It was too good to pass up!

He hopped up on the counter and helped himself, taking four waffles and drenching them in syrup. This was followed by a few strips of bacon and sausage links, and to top it off, a massive slice of cake. Theo's eyes widened. "Alvin, are you sure you can handle all that?"

Alvin looked at his plate.
1111.title: The next day...

choices: "...and all the rest of breakfast, including the cake?"
11111.content:
"Of course! Watch me!", scoffed the red-sweatered chipmunk.

***later***

Theodore looked up as a massive belch echoed from the couch. He sighed and headed over to check on Alvin. To his surprise, Alvin's plate was empty! Alvin sat, licking the sticky syrup and crumbs of his paw, other hand resting on his stuffed, sticky, fur-covered belly. Theo gazed in awe.

Alvin patted his enlarged gut, belching again. "How was that, Theo?"

Theo masked his amazement, quickly pretending to be disinterested. "If I was Simon, I would say that was impressive. But you forget that I'm not the thinnest chipmunk ever and you just ate a normal meal for me.", he quickly lied. He didn't know why, but he wanted to see Alvin get fat in the next few days. Maybe so he wouldn't feel so alone, or do he could make fun of Alvin like Alvin did to him.

Alvin protested. "Woah, woah, woah! Who said I was done? Can you bring me a jug of milk and..."
11111.title: "Of course! Watch me!"

111112.content:
"...and all the rest of breakfast? Bring the cake too. I'm going to eat as much as I want until Dave gets home, then I'll just work it off", Alvin finished.

Theo shook his head, heading back to the kitchen. He looked down at his own stomach. He knew exactly how difficult it was to get rid of that weight once you got it. He gathered up the remaining 4 waffles, 7 strips of bacon, and 5 sausage links and placed them on a plate, which he took to Alvin. Alvin licked his lips and said, "Thanks Theo! I would have gotten it myself, but I need to conserve my energy for this upcoming battle." He motioned to the screen as Theodore retrieved the cake and syrup. Drowning the waffles in syrup, Alvin proceeded to eat the breakfast with gusto. He was already slowing down when Theo returned with the slightly more than half full jug of milk.

Theo sat on the couch next to Alvin and tried to focus on the videogame, but he found Alvin's growing belly to be a bit distracting. For some reason, he found it extremely attractive....
111112.title: "...and all the rest of breakfast, includin...

1111121.content:
***later***

"Wow. I ate -urp- way too much.", moaned Alvin. A globe of sticky, fur-covered stomach covered the television from his view. He rested one hand on his belly, releasing another belch. His stomach hurt, but it felt comfortably full and warm. He liked the feeling, though he would never tell anyone. He ran his hand up the curve, starting at the bottom. He felt massive after eating so much.

Theo watched him enjoy himself. He grinned. This was going to be easy.

***Later, a little after noon***

"Hey Alvin? Ready for lunch?", Theo asked expectantly. Alvin glanced over at Theo, then back at his gut. He hesitated.
1111121.title: Half an hour later...

11111211.content:
"Great! I'll fix you up some more food!", Theo said with a grin. He stepped over by Alvin and patted his round belly. "A big boy like you probably wants a lot!", he joked, before leaving for the kitchen.

Alvin watched him go, relishing the feeling of being called a big boy. Normally, "big" was not a word used to describe chipmunks. He liked being big. He stared at his stretched, gorged belly for a moment. Then he shifted so he could see past it to the television.

Meanwhile, Theodore was making sandwiches in the kitchen, when the phone rang. Curious, he hopped over to it and picked it up. "Hello?", he questioned.

"Hey, Theodore. It's me, Dave." He seemed to hesitate for a moment. "Listen, grandma is pretty sick, so I have to take care of her. Simon and Jeanette are in charge, but no one else, other than me and you, knows how to cook. So, I was thinking... maybe I could pick you up and bring you down here to help Simon? It would only be until grandma gets better-"

"Dave! I'd be happy to help. Do you want Alvin to come too?", Theo asked.

Dave sighed. "No, I don't think he'll help very much. It would be better if he just stayed there. I'll be there in about half an hour. Thanks, Theodore."

"Bye, Dave!" Theo said, happily. He quickly finished the sandwiches, and rushed out to tell Alvin.
11111211.title: "Why not?"

choices: Watch television and wait for dinner!
111112111.content:
***later***

Alvin burped, no longer bothering to muffle it now that the whole house was his. He had just finished off the last of Theo's sandwiches. He felt even larger than before. His gut was so swollen, he could barely move. Amazingly, he forced himself into the sitting position, though he had to lean back. He rose to his feet panting, and headed for the bathroom. That gallon of milk from earlier needed to be released

***after***

Alvin stood in front of the mirror, shirtless. After all, he couldn't even pull it over his belly anyway, and he was by himself. He studied the curves of his swollen body. It stuck out almost two inches from his body, and even rounded out the sides of his belly. He loved it; the size, roundness, smoothness, firmness... everything! He stroked it, feeling every inch of his furry food-baby.

Soon, he left the bathroom, still rubbing his rounded gut. What to do?
111112111.title: After Theo leaves...

choices: No money, but a few bags of junk food!
1111121111.content:
Definitely time for more food! He needed to take advantage of this alone time as much as he could!

Alvin headed into the kitchen and looked around for a bit, absently rubbing his belly. He stopped. He didn't know how to cook anything. He could only eat stuff that didn't need to be cooked! Disappointed, he stopped to think. Suddenly, an idea popped into his head. Perhaps Dave had left that emergency money in the cupboard! He grinned. That would easily feed him for a few days. Alvin started to hoist himself up to the counter, which took a lot longer than usual due to the large amount of food sitting in his round belly.

After a few minutes, Alvin finally reached the cupboard, panting. He reached up, opening the cupboard to reveal...
1111121111.title: Time for more food!

11111211112.content: Snatching the cash, Alvin smiled. Now, what to get...?
11111211112.title: Score! 200 dollars, cash!

111112111121.content:
Alvin grabbed the phone, dialed the pizza place, and waited patiently, practicing his Dave impersonation. The tone ended.

"Hi, what can I get you?"

Alvin grinned, and responded, "Hey, can I get two large pepperoni pizzas delivered to 5467 First Street?"

On the other end of the phone, the young man hesitated at the high pitched voice coming through. But, money was money, he shrugged. "Alright, we'll have that delivered as soon as possible."

Alvin hung up and moved back into the living room to rub his belly and watch television.
111112111121.title: Pizza, of course!

choices: Dave comes home to check on Alvin that night...
1111121111211.content:
Alvin lay asleep on the couch, hidden behind the slowly rising and falling of his full stomach. Beyond full, actually! His belly was even more massive than before! He had had a little time to digest, as it took him a good few hours of slow eating to get through the pizza, so he hadn't popped. His belly stuck out on all sides, it was so swollen.

Alvin lay, both hands on his rounded gut, snoring. He looked as if he had swallowed Theodore or Simon. Which of course, he hadn't. His sleeping face held an expression of pleasure and accomplishment, mixed with a little pain.
1111121111211.title: ***later***

11111211112111.content:
Alvin once again stood in front of the mirror, staring at his reflection. His belly had deflated somewhat, he noticed with disappointment, but it was much softer than the day before. He still felt full, though it no longer hurt. Not to mention he now had soft love handles. He jiggled one, smiling. He enjoyed being big, regardless of how squishy he felt.

He pulled his sweatshirt on as far down as it would go, but it wouldn't go past the top part of his belly. He loved it. In fact, he decided to get bigger!
11111211112111.title: The next morning...

111112111121112.content: after a few days of gaining, how big is he?
111112111121112.title: Later that week...

1111121111211121.content:
Alvin was one fat chipmunk. He has a pop belly, A cup moobs, & wide booty.

"I look great" Alvin said as he look at the mirror shirtless as he jiggle his fat belly. "How much i weight" He said.

So he wobble to the bathroom & got on the scale wait for the number to come up.

The scale said "Your weight is..."
1111121111211121.title: fat

choices: Continue helping Theodore as usual and try to lose weight later...
Try to lose weight now and still help Theodore by eating less cakes...
1112.content:
"80...85...90...95!...98!!! I can't believe it! Eight pounds in a week!" exclaimed a bewildered Alvin.

Currently, Alvin was on the bathroom scale panicking about his sudden weight gain. His appearance hadn't changed much, but it was still noticeable. His face had gone from a more angular face to a more cherubic look due to his plump cheeks and slight second chin. His once slim stomach had become a small pot belly that was only barely contained by his pajamas. His chest had started to poof out and his rear stuck out about and inch more. His arms and legs had lost all definition they might have had and were covered in a layer of fat.

"Oh man, I should have known this would've happened! I mean, all 8 slices of cake a day! And there's Theodore, he's looked like he's gained some weight also."

And that was the truth. Theodore was quickly crossing the line from chubby to down right fat. His face had two chins and a diminishing neck, his gut had grown considerably and had two flabby chipmunk boy boobs resting on top of them. Also, he had gotten a slight waddle recently.

"I don't know what to do. I can't upset Theodore and I really don't want to stop eating his cakes. On the other hand, I've got to lose this weight!" said Alvin, who was still struggling on what to do before he decide to...
1112.title: Weight Gain!

choices: Theodore made the cake incorrectly and was deemed a failure...
11121.content:
“I’ll continue helping Theodore then lose the weight later. I’m sure no one will notice a few extra pounds,” Alvin said while patting his stomach. He was right. No one ever did notice the two growing chipmunks.

Another week went by and Dave’s birthday had arrived and Theodore was still having trouble with the cake recipe . Thanks to the numerous amounts of cake a day, he had gained a considerable amount of weight. He no longer looked like the cute little butterball he once was. Even calling him fat was a under statement. Theo’s neck was completely hidden under his three and half chins. His green hoodie no longer covered his belly and was starting to look more like a half shirt. His stomach now touches the ground at all times. This made the chore of walking, more like waddling, very difficult. His thighs had also grown to accommodate his new ample form.

Alvin was starting to look more and more like Theodore use to look a week ago. Being a slightly taller than Theodore, Alvin didn't have that cute butterball look that Theodore always had. His arms became rounder and continued losing their definition they had previously. His thighs had grown right along with his butt giving him a more pare shape looking body. Alvin also had a nice little belly to accommodate his wider appearance.

“I hope this cake it right. I don’t think I can stand eating anymore,” said Theodore.

“Yeah. If I eat anymore cake, I won’t be able to get up!” replied Alvin.

The two chipmunk took a bite of Theodore’s latest cake and crossed their fingers. This time...
11121.title: Continue helping Theodore as usual and try to l...

choices: Thirsty! Time to get something to drink."
111211.content:
“This is it Theodore!” said Alvin with a mouth full of cake. “I hope you remembered to write down the recipe so you can make another one for later.”

“I sure did Alvin! I’m going to get started making the cake for tonight right now,” replied Theodore as he waddled back to the kitchen. This left Alvin alone with a whole cake to himself.

“Well I’m not one to leave a chocolate cake go uneaten,” Alvin said to himself. “No one could ever have too much cake. Especially a cake that taste this good.”

Alvin grabbed another slice of caked and shoved it into his mouth. As he ate the world around him seem to disappear. All that was left was a chipmunk and his cake. As slice after slice when into his mouth his desire for more increase. By the time he finished the cake, the world was starting to come back into focus. Alvin snapped out of his food filled bliss wanting more. Luckily for him the next cake was done. Walking into the kitchen Alvin could see the cake sitting on the counter. Theodore was nowhere around.

“He must have went to get Dave,” Alvin said to himself. “I don’t think Theodore would mind if I have a little taste to make sure this one was correct too.” Alvin took his chubby hand and grabbed a little piece from the back so no one would notice. Like before, this cake was a masterpiece of flavor. Before long the whole cake found a new home inside Alvin’s stomach.

"That was good but, now I'm...
111211.title: Theodore made the cake correctly...

choices: call one of the Chipettes and see if they can help.
have another snack. I can't fake a recipe on a empty stomach!
1112111.content:
"Thirsty! I wonder what we have in the old ice box to quench my parched little throat?"

Alvin opened the refrigerator door and located the full gallon of milk in sitting on the shelf.

"This will do the trick," Alvin grunted as he lifted the gallon of milk with some difficulty. His chipmunk arms were never made for heavy lifting and it was tougher for him to reach the container with his slightly bigger bottom weighing him down. Once he finally had the jug, Alvin unscrewed the cap, placed his mouth where the cap once was and stared to chug. His little throat gulped and gulped as the crisp liquid was rushed down his throat. About half way through the gallon, Alvin decided that the milk was too cool and too refreshing to let it all go to waste. Alvin also knew his stomach would not be satisfied until he emptied the container. And empty it he did.

Once Alvin had finished, he placed the empty jug back on the counter. There he noticed Theodore's cake recipe with little white speckles of milk on top. Acting fast, he wiped off the milk speckles off with his hand and smeared the recipe in the processes.

"I've made a huge mistake," Alvin said under his breath as he look as the damage he caused. "I need to fix this before Theodore finds out! I know, I'll copy what is still legible onto a new sheet of paper and make up the rest. Before I do that I should..."
1112111.title: Thirsty! Time to get something to drink."

choices: Alvin wakes up much fatter with an angry Theodore awaiting him
1112112.content:
Sleepy! Where's that couch again?" Alvin squeaked as he rubbed his bulging gut, not caring that he ate the cake meant for Dave. His slow ponderous footsteps scraped lightly against the tile as his fat body wobbled to and fro, his long red shirt no longer reaching his feet, but instead hovering several inches above them. The chipmunk spotted the couch and made a slow bee line towards it, eyes drooping as the sugar and butter began making him drowsy. Though clambering up the couch was going to be difficult as his pudgy arms were pudgy and weak, unlike Theodore who's been actually working making cakes, Alvin has been lazy doing nothing much but eat them. He cursed and he flailed, his fat plump cheeks cradling his small puffy tail jiggling while his short legs thrashed against finding a foothold in the fabric. The chipmunk even desperately began hopping up and down, his bloated body sloshing up and down and thick moobs slapping against his gut, clear that he's gained a considerable amount of weight and even more with the two massive cakes in his gut preventing him from getting up.

"Wait *pant pant* what am... *wheeze* I thinking" he commented to himself, looking around to find the padded foot rest that rested near the fireplace. He went over to slowly retrieve it with waning breath and sweat slowly starting to collect on his fur. Though the first few attempts still failed, his large taught gut getting in the way of his climb, so instead he went over on his side, and soon he was on the foot rest with his gut sprawled out in front of him. Small grabby paws pulled at the sofa's fabric to get him upright, and he backed his padded posterior onto the soft cushions. The chipmunk wheezed heavily, grabbing onto what he could of his gut to calm himself down, though he could feel his paws sinking into his yielding fat.

"Alright... I 'might' need to go on a diet" he huffed, "right after this nap." He turned his cap around and pulled it down to cover his eyes and slowly rested on his back. His soft body oozing outwards from gravity onto the soft sofa cushions a bit as the warmth radiating from his overly plush body comforted him into a restful sleep.
1112112.title: Sleepy! Where's that couch again?"

111212.content:
Theodore and Alvin couldn't believe it, starring in disbelief as the cake they were certain was the one, wasn't.
"This will never do." Theodore says in his state of shock. "We'll just have to keep make as many as needed by the end of the day to have it ready before Dave gets home."
"Are you crazy Theodore. I can't handle that much cake." Alvin protested knowing full well his size wasn't getting any smaller.
"Come on Alvin." Theodore pleaded. "I want this to be the best thing Dave has ever gotten. We owe him so much."
Alvin though a bit struggling to climb into a chair to think. "Fine. This is the last day though. I'm going on a diet after this."
"Yippee!" Theodore shouted in delight as he began to make an assortment of cakes trying to find the perfect one.

How many more cakes does it take for Theodore to be pleased enough to give it to Dave.

"Well Alvin are you going eat all 8 cakes?" asks Theodore.

What will Alvin do?

1123.content:
There was a knock on the door to the home of the chipmunks, Alvin open the door to see Jeanette on the other side. "Um, Hi." She said a little bit shy. "What's up Jeanette?" Alvin asked. "Well um, Simon dosen't happen to be home?" Jeanette asked carefully. "He's upstairs sitting in his room making new inventions." Alvin answered. "If you want to see him you can come in."

Not wanting to refuse his offer Jeanette made her way inside. Alvin pointed to where she could find Simon's room, and on her way towards it she was greeted by Theodore in the staircase. He was so happy to see her that he gave her a big hug, and being the big sized chipmunk that he was Jeanette felt how she was being a bit engulfed by his body. Once he was done and had release her Jeanette first then realized just how much she had actually enjoyed it. As she saw him walk downstairs towards the kitchen all Jeanette could think about would be to once again hug that warn soft body of his.

When she finally arrived to Simon's room both he and her was really happy to see each other. But even though they where both in love to each other Jeanette felt like something wasn't right when she looked into Simon's eyes. He was still the same wonderfull guy she had fallen in love with, he still had the same charm, the same kindness, the same personality, but still something felt like it was missing. And then it hit her. It was his body.

As she hugged him she could feel a clear difference between hugging him and hugging Theodore. While Theodore had been much more warmer and cuddly Simon felt much more even in comparison. Even the feeling of being able to reach around his waist felt like a bit of a dissapointment. She loved Simon but she also liked feeling Theodore's body, "If only there was a way to combine the two." she thought. And then she got an idea.

It was a wery simple but effective idea at the same time. If she wanted Simon to get the same body as Theodore then she would have to make him get on. She remembers how on dates Simon always seemed to have no controll on his apetite when he was close to Jeanette. "Maybe I could use that." She thought. But at the same time it didn't felt right for her to trick him into becoming a fatty without his knowing. "Maybe I should first tell him about my desire's before doing anything?" She thought.

She sat and thought about it for a moment before coming to the conclusion...

So he waddle to the bathroom to the scale to weight himself & see what was his new weight number.

Simon said "Here come my new weight number"

112311222.title: 2 months

choices: No milk.  Time to go to the market.
113.content:
Theodore was the largest of the Chipmunks, but this was no surprise to anyone. He enjoyed cooking food, just as much as he loved eating. On this particular day he was about to see what happens if you like eating a little too much.

Theodore was busily baking a tray of cookies in the oven. The rest of his family went out to see a horror movie, one of the things he greatly disliked and so he decided to stay home. "Ding" went the oven as his cookies finished. He took them out savoring their delicious odor before letting them cool down.
When it was time to eat he munched them all down. All 20 of them. He licked his fingers clean and prepared to tidy up when he saw how much batter he still had. Not wanting it to go to waste he made another set of 20 cookies... three times.
He finished the last of his 80 cookies in no time at all. When he stood up he was surprised to find his belly was bulging out a foot from all the cookies he ate. It was then he realized how thirsty he was. He went to the fridge to get some milk.
113.title: If You Give a Chipmunk a Cookie...

choices: Theodore wakes up, having blocked out the memory of his stuffing session.
His family comes home after the movie and wakes him up to tell him about it.
1131.content:
Theodore located the full gallon of milk in the fridge and heaved it out with some difficulty. His chipmunk arms were never really made for heavy lifting and it was tough for him to reach the container with his slightly bigger paunch pressing into the other items on the lower shelves. Once he finally had the thing, he unscrewed the cap, placed his mouth to the opening and turned the container straight upside down, using his hands to balance it and keep milk from spilling all over the floor (though a little did anyway).

His little throat gulped and gulped and gulped as the crisp liquid was dragged down by gravity. It was so refreshing to wash down all of those delicious cookies with some nice cold milk that Theodore knew he wouldn't be satisfied until he emptied the container. And empty it he did.

For a brief moment, a look of perfect contentment washed over Theodore's face as the milk settled in his stomach. Then, Theodore felt an ache that immediately informed him he had made a big mistake.

Theodore looked down toward the floor to find that the tummy he typically saw in the way of his feet now totally obscured his vision. A bloated belly full of cookies and milk hung heavily off of his frame, and he doubled over as a pulsing pain shot through his abdomen.

"Agh!" Theodore groaned, holding his stomach. "Well, I guess that WAS a lot to eat in one sitting. Even for me."

Theodore slowly and painfully waddled over to the couch to try and relax while waiting for his stomach to settle. With some effort, he managed to get up onto the cushions and lay his head back on the armrest. He rubbed his gut softly, trying to ease his protesting tummy and he found his eyelids growing heavy as he did so.

A yawn escaped his lips as the ache began to decrease and his drowsiness began to increase. Too quickly for him to realize it, he had fallen fast asleep.
1131.title: Chug the whole thing.

choices: He finds Theodore helping himself to a midnight snack.
He finds Theodore sleepwalking (and possibly sleepeating?).
11312.content:
"And did you see the fangs on the werewolf? Each one was the size of one my arms!" Alvin recalled, excitedly. "And with those glasses on, it looked real-er than reality. I'm tellin' ya, I could practically FEEL the saliva dripping from his teeth. That was the best movie I've ever seen."

"EVERY movie we see is the new best movie you've ever seen," Simon said. "Every movie with something snarling or exploding anyway. And I hate those stupid 3D glasses. They don't fit over my own, and I can't take either pair off or the screen gets blurry. It's silly."

"Whatever. You're just grumpy 'cause you got scared."

"I got scared? You're the one who covered your eyes and shrieked every time you heard a loud noise. I'm surprised you saw enough of the movie to know what the monster was."

"I knew it was a mistake to take you boys to a movie like that at night," Dave said, putting his key in the lock of the knob as they arrived at the front door. "You're gonna have night...mares...." Dave's voice trailed off as he walked into the house. He was at a loss for words for what he saw.

"Theodore?" Simon said, almost as awestruck. "What happened to you?"

Theodore didn't hear them, as he was still dozing on the couch, snoring softly. His belly, now considerably less bloated but still quite flabby after the digestion of his snack a few hours ago, heaved up and down with his breathing.

"Theodore? Theodore!" Simon pressed, shaking Theodore from his slumber.

"Huh! Er...what?" Theodore jolted awake in a rush, rubbing the sand from his eyes. "Simon? What's wrong?"

"That's exactly what I would like to know," Simon said, placing his hand on Theodore's gelatinous gut and giving it a shake. "Did you binge while we were out?"

"Uh, n-no," Theodore stuttered, looking down at his newly layered frame. "I mean, I just made myself some cookies and—and...."

"There are four cookie trays here!" Alvin hollered from the kitchen. "You made FOUR trays worth of cookies? There aren't even any leftovers!"

"I-I...I...." Theodore's throat seemed to collapse around his words. The shouting and interrogation was sending him into a panic. This was not his favorite way to wake up.

"I know you've got an appetite, butterball, but did you have to eat ALL of the cookies?" Alvin said, stomping into the living room. "You're not hibernating for the winter, pal, you don't need that much blubber."

"ALVIN!" Dave bellowed, finally finding his voice again. "That's enough out of you. You don't speak to your little brother that way."

"Dave, if he's gonna make a pig of himself every time we go somewhere without him, we're gonna have to chain him up in the garage or something," Alvin said, seeming to think he was stating a cold, hard truth.

"I'm sorry," Theodore said, nearly on the verge of tears. "I didn't mean to...to...."

"It's okay, Theodore," Simon said, rubbing the chubby 'munk's back. "No one's mad at you."

"I beg to dif—FREMFUFFM." Alvin's mouth was muffled by Dave's hand before he could lose his temper again.

"That's it. We'll talk about this in the morning; everyone upstairs. It's past your bedtime anyway. And I don't wanna here a PEEP out of any of you for the rest of the night," Dave warned, emphasizing the point for Alvin.

The three brothers shuffled upstairs and to their bedroom in silence. They changed into their pajamas, with Theodore having particular difficulty buttoning his onesie. He managed to make it work, since his digestive system had displaced the cookies and milk from his stomach into fat around his body so it wasn't all concentrated in one spot, but his overall bulkier shape made it a tight fit. He looked like a chipmunk stuffed into a cloth disposable glove.

The trio got into bed without a sound. None of them felt like risking Dave's wrath tonight, especially not Alvin, who was already starting to feel badly about what he had said to Theodore. He made a mental note to apologize to him in the morning.

A few hours later, after the boys had fallen asleep, a ruckus downstairs stirred Simon to consciousness. He pushed himself up onto his elbows and put his glasses on, looking around the room. He noticed Theodore was missing.

Expecting the worst and hoping to be wrong, Simon padded downstairs as quietly as he could to investigate the noises he heard.
11312.title: Theodore, the Slumbering

choices: Theodore goes to the Chipettes' house.

113122.content:
Simon, as silently as he could manage, tip-toed down the steps, discerning that the noise was clearly coming from the kitchen. Theodore, he saw, was lazily rummaging through the cabinets, grabbing food stuffs as he went—instantly edible things, like loaves of bread, wedges of cheese, bags of chips and packaged sweets. Pans, containers and cooking utensils were strewn about the floor, haphazardly cast aside in Theodore's hunt for eatable items.

"Theodore!" Simon shouted, stepping into the kitchen proper and putting his hands on his hips like a scolding father.

Without missing a beat, Theodore turned around with his arms full of food, though it was not in response to Simon's presence at all. It was at this moment that Simon realized Theodore's eyes were closed and his mouth was moving in a peculiar way. There was nothing in it, and he wasn't speaking (aside from some unintelligible mumblings here and there). It seemed like he was still sleeping and eating an invisible something.

Simon waved his hand in front of Theodore's face, testing for recognition. "Theodore, are you...sleepwalking?"

Unaware that Simon was even standing near him, Theodore strode toward the front door with his mountain of new found treats, caging them with his arms on his little shelf of a belly. He was leaving the house.

Simon's immediate instinct was to try and stop him, but he had read that it was unwise to wake sleepwalkers due to the way they may react to waking up so suddenly in a strange location. Though he questioned the validity of such a concept, Simon didn't want to take any chances. He decided the safest thing to do would be to follow Theodore and try to keep him out of trouble until he woke up on his own.

With no time to run upstairs to wake anyone else, Simon laced up his shoes, slipped on his thin jacket and began trailing Theodore as the barefoot 'munk made his way down the cold, stone sidewalk.

"Oh, brother," Simon said. "The things I do for a brother."

11321.content:
Huffing, puffing and generally feeling exhausted from all the running, Theodore came to rest at the end of the aisle on his bottom. Which, he noticed, was a bit more padded than the last time he had sat upon it.

Theodore looked down at the distended belly that hovered between his splayed legs. He placed a hand near his naval, hoping against hope that maybe it was just a trick of the light and that really he was still just his normal chubby self. But alas, it definitely felt bigger. "Err...no big deal," Theodore told himself, not caring to notice the irony in that statement. "Once Alvin, Simon and I head out on tour, I'll work this off."

He had some trouble believing himself—after all, he and the other chipmunks had been on countless tours before and he never managed to drop any weight. Still, the thought made him feel better.

As his breathing evened out, he felt his eyelids getting heavy. Soon, they dropped completely and the even breathing became a soft snore. Theodore unconsciously curled himself up into a ball on the floor and was counting sheep before he knew it.

Some hours later, when he awoke, he saw...

113211.content:
As Theodore awoke, he saw the face of his crush, Eleanor, smiling brightly at him, "Hey there sleepy head!" Eleanor said cheerily, Theodore looked around in confusion then back at Eleanor, "Hey," Theodore spoke hesitantly,"How'd you get in here?" Eleanor giggled a little, "What? This place? Well, let's say it's my own private testing lab." Theodore stood up and brushed himself off, "Testing lab? But this is a grocery store! How can it be yours?" Eleanor just giggled a little more, "It's hard to explain, but. . ." Eleanor stood there for a few seconds, "Well? Out with it." Theo said a little forcefully, a little annoyance showing on his chubby face, "Okay, fine, I can't tell you how I got ownership of this place, or how it's actually a lab, but I can tell you what I'm using it for."
"And what would that be?" Theo asked.
"I used it in hopes you would come here alone one day so I could go forward with my plan, but you always kept coming with your brothers or Dave."
"Plan? What plan?" Theodore wasn't sure he fully understood Eleanor, she didn't act like this normally.
"My plan," Eleanor took a step closer to Theodore,"To make you the butterball I always wanted you to be." She put a paw on Theo's pudgy tummy, "Eleanor, what are you talking about? Are you okay?" Eleanor giggled again, "I'm fine Theo, as for what I'm talking about, I want you bigger, please Theo, I love how chubby you are, and I love you, let me get you to put on a few more pounds, 'kay?" Theodore thought for a moment, "Well, I, uh, umm. . ."


What will Theodore say?

Eleanor jumped up and down with glee, "Oh yay! Hold on, I'll go get you some food." With that Eleanor ran off, leaving Theodore pondering what Eleanor meant by 'Butterball', as he thought one of his paws drifted down and traced the curve of his tummy, "How big is she gonna make me?" His train of thought was broken as he saw Eleanor come back, her arms were full of donut boxes, "I'm back, you ready?" Theodore nodded in earnest, licking his lips, donuts were his fave, "Alright, sit down." And he did just that as Eleanor stacked the boxes to one side and placed one in his paws, she then proceeded to lay belly down on the floor, "Go ahead and eat, I'll watch."
"Er, okay." Theo opened the white box and gazed upon a dozen or so of the most delicious looking glazed donuts he'd seen, he picked one up and sniffed it, a wonderful sugary aroma wafted to his nose, which made his tummy growl a little, "Sounds like someone's hungry." Eleanor said teasingly, Theo couldn't help but blush as he took a bite of the donut, "Wow! That's the best tasting donut I've ever eaten!" He shoved the rest into his mouth and began to stuff his face, one donut after the other disappeared into his mouth until finally he reached the bottom, upon which Eleanor replaced the empty box with another full box. Slowly Theo emptied one box after another, he was about to stop at his fifth box when he suddenly felt full, "ohhh." Theo leaned back and looked at his belly, it completely filled his lap and bulged roundly, it had hiked part of his hoodie up with it's increased size, Eleanor put the new box down and rubbed Theodore's full belly, "Aww, look at your tummy all big and full and plump." She patted it affectionately, "Eleanor," Theo said lazily, "Can I take a nap? My belly is hot and it's making me sleepy." The she-munk gave Theo's tummy a little sqeeze before saying, "Okay, you gonna sleep right here?" Theodore nodded sluggishly, "Okay, sleep tight, my plump butterball." With that Eleanor strolled off and Theo, feeling oh so sleepy, conked out on the cold tile floor, dreaming about eating those delicious donuts. Little did poor Theo know, those donuts were more than they seemed. . .

Your in charge of the house while we're away."

“Hey Britt, whatcha got there?” Jeanette asked Brittany as she entered the kitchen.

“Is the note E flat or A minor?”

As Jeanette was reading the note Brittany was scanning the refrigerator for something to eat. Everything looks so good, Brittany thought to herself, I'm sure nothing bad will happen if I have myself a "little" snack.

“Brittany, this note says that we are all in charge not just you,” Jeanette said after she finished reading the note.

“Nothing gets past you eagle eye,” Brittany sarcastically replied as she slammed the refrigerator door. In her hands she had a small pizza, some materials to make a ham sandwich, and half a chocolate cake. “If you need me Jeanette, I’ll be in my room having a little snack.”

1213111.content:
Despite the fact that Brittany had already eaten enough food to be nearly as large as herself over again, she found she still had the urge to indulge even further.

She debated whether she really should for a moment...but...she didn't really have that much trouble making up her mind. She was a beautiful, talented, growing girl- she deserved to treat herself a little if she decided she wanted to!

Brittany grunted a little as she slid out of bed, blinking in surprise, she looked down at her huge belly. The food she'd eaten was all human sized, so it had much more of an impact on her chipmunk sized figure. Her belly bulged out, packed with all the food and shaped into a big round orb, which hung off the front of her nearly enough to touch the floor. Being so round, it was about as wide as it was tall- and stuck out as far from her.

Brittany was taken aback by her size, she hadn't even noticed- being so wrapped up in eating. She thought for a moment about whether she should go to get more...

Before brushing it off.

"Eh, it isn't really that much." She said, giving her huge belly a gentle pat that made it wobble. "I am a growing girl, after all- this is probably perfectly normal for a healthy appetite like mine."

"Speaking of my healthy appetite..." She said, licking her lips as she headed downstairs to get more food. She had to grab her belly with both arms and hold it up in front of her to comfortably make it down the stairs, but it was no concern to her.

When she got back to the Kitchen, she passed by Jeanette again. When Jeanette saw Brittany, her eyes almost bugged out of her head in surprise.

"Oh my gosh- Brittany!" Jeanette exclaimed.

"What?" Brittany asked with an eyebrow raised, before pointing to her belly. "...oh, this? This is nothing, honestly I'm surprised you even noticed."

Jeanette scoffed a little, "Brittany- that is not nothing! You-" but she quickly cut herself off when she saw Brittany shooting her a very nasty look. Jeanette sighed. "Fine, whatever. It's nothing- you're as skinny as ever." She remarked sarcastically.

"Oh please, it's just a little bloating." Brittany asserted. "Once it digests you'll never even know I ate anything- I have a great metabolism." She said, before smirking. "That's why I have the best figure out of all of us."

"Mhm..." Jeanette mumbled, going back to reading her book. It wasn't her business what Brittany did to herself, after all.

Brittany looked around her bed, which was covered in piles of junk food, the greedy little Chipette having seen fit to root through every last cabinet in the kitchen and take out all the snacks that there were. It was so much she couldn't even carry it all up to her room at once, and had to make a few return trips.

The big-bellied diva briefly considered eating only half of her snacks, maybe saving the rest for later- but all it took was one big rumble from her huge belly to change her mind.

"I brought this up here so I could enjoy it!" Brittany said, "I'm not gonna hold back- this is for me!"

She giggled as she grabbed a can of soda which was almost as tall as she was. She sat down in the middle of her bed, her paws kicked out in front of her, legs spread apart a bit to make room for her huge belly. She wiggled her toes in anticipation, shimmying her hips side to side as she settled into a comfortable position, and popped the tab off the can of soda.

"I deserve this!" She reminded herself, before hoisting the can to her lips with both arms, beginning to chug the fizzy sugary drink.

Over the course of the next several minutes, Brittany worked her way through the stockpile of snacks with incredible gusto, enthusiastically eating and eating, paying no mind to how her already oversized belly grew more and more with every swallow.

She tore open bags of chips, popcorn, and pretzels, taking big bites of chips as big as her head into her mouth one after another, feasting on popcorn piece by piece, upending the bag to get all the stray crumbs.

She'd go on right to a box of cookies, each one big enough for her to need to hold with two hands, savoring the chewiness or crunchiness of one type compared to another.

She dug into pastries like she was looking for buried treasure, from cheap snack cakes to bakery made cakes in plastic tins, she tore off chunks and shoveled them into her maw, lapping up the icing with her tongue.

She'd bite off parts of candy bars, turning them around in her hands, getting through the rich chocolate coating to the cookies, caramel, peanut butter, nougat, and whatever else was hiding inside.

Occasionally, she'd guzzle down a can of soda, or sometimes even a whole liter. Allowing the tide of fizzy sugary flavored sweet liquid to wash over her, as she shoved her whole face in the whole and gulped down as much as she could until it was all empty.

All throughout her binge, Brittany tossed aside the empty bottles and bags and boxes, not paying any mind if she got some loose crumbs or sugar or icing or something on her face, fingers, or even her chest. She was being a tiny bit of a slob, but her messy eating was just because she was enjoying it so much!

Once she finally finished gorging, Brittany let out a long, loud, brassy belch, which shook her almost as much as her tummy rumbling earlier.

"BBBBRRRRRRWWWWWUUOOOOOORRRRRRPPPP- hic- ahh....now that was a snack!" Brittany said, licking a little sugar residue off of her lips. She gently rubbed her belly, looking up at it rise before her.

She'd eaten so much that her belly had swollen to a ludicrous size. As she sat with her footpaws out in front of her, it rose up high, far and wide in front of her. It was so full it had a bit of a pink tint to it at the end, along with a few stretch marks. Brittany hiccupped, giving it a satisfied pat as her eyelids began to droop.

"There...my perfectly healthy appetite's nice and satisfied for now...urp..." She yawned as she began to fall into a food coma, her belly gurgling as it worked to digest all that unhealthy junk food packed into it.

"I just...need to take a li'l nap...once I wake up, this bloating is gonna be gone...urp...and I'll be nice and skinny...just like normal..." She said, as she drifted off to sleep, her body already beginning to plump up as the food was turned into pure fat.

Jeanette was stunned, quickly hopping up onto her sister's bed, approaching Brittany's head and shaking her, causing her multitude of chins to wobble.

"Brittany? Brittany! Wake up!!" Jeanette yelled, until- after a moment of stirring- the bloated ball of fat that was Brittany slowly blinked awake. Jeanette sighed with relief.

"bluhg...wh-...Jeanette? Why are you...what's going on?" Brittany said, trying to get up for a moment- finding she was totally pinned in place.

"What's going on?? Um- you ATE ALL the junk food in the house and now you're HUGE! That's what's going on!! I told you that wasn't nothing earlier, and now look how fat you are!" Jeanette exclaimed. After a moment, Brittany fully woke up. She responded...

12131111222.content:
Brittany scoffed, raising an eyebrow at her sister. "Fat? What the heck are you talking about?"

Jeanette blinked, taken aback by the statement, before gesturing to Brittany's body. "Look at you!!"

Brittany rolled her eyes, "I look fine, Jeanette. Just like I said, once I digested that little snack, the bloating went away, and I went right back to my perfect figure. Didn't I tell you I had a good metabolism?" Said Brittany, wiggling her little paw, as if she was trying to gesture or show off, but only succeeding in making the fat encasing her body wobble a bit.

Jeanette couldn't believe what she was hearing. "Oh yeah? Then what do you call this, huh?" She demanded, grabbing one of Brittany's numerous chins, the fat squishing between her fingers.

"...Fur." Brittany said, completely stonefaced. "I'm fluffy, after all."

"Wh- but....Well fine! If you're in such good shape then get up and walk!" Jeanette demanded again, getting frustrated with her sister's stubbornness.

"I don't want to." Brittany said, turning up her nose. "I am a beautiful, talented, wealthy superstar after all. If I don't feel like walking, I shouldn't have to walk." Brittany asserted, wiggling her toes a little- unable to find purchase, she added "I could if I wanted to, of course- but I could do any old chore. And I don't want to."

Jeanette, at a loss, groaned and threw up her arms. "Fine- it's more trouble than it's worth... Congratulations, Brittany, you're in perfect shape."

Brittany smirked, giggling a little. "Of course I am." Before she paused, thinking for a moment. "Hmm...You know what I need?"

"What?" Jeanette asked, dryly.

"I need breakfast." Brittany declared.

"...Breakfast? Brittany, it's four in the afternoon." Jeanette said, incredulously.

"Well yeah, but I just woke up! I need to eat breakfast- And right after I finish Breakfast, I'm gonna need to eat some Lunch, if I wanna be ready in time for Dinner!" Brittany said, turning to Jeanette. "Hey- go get Elenor. I still don't feel like walking or anything- so I need you two to help me get my food."

Jeanette opened her mouth to protest...before shaking her head. "...Alright, fine." She conceded, "But only because I'm interested to see how far this'll go..." Jeanette said, before hopping off of the bed and scurrying into the hall, leaving Brittany to lazily lounge in the comfort of her own fat, as she called out "Hey Elenor! You'll never believe what Brittany's up to this time..."

121311112221.content:
Elenor was shocked by Brittany's sudden expansion too, at first, surprised by how the moment their authority figure went away, Brittany was more than willing to indulge in sheer unadulterated gluttony. She was also a bit disappointed that all the snacks were gone.

However, like Jeanette, Elenor was interested in this current chain of events, and was more than willing to go along with it for the fun of it, and see how far it could go.

The two of them didn't realize how heavy Brittany would be.

"oof- Ow! Hey- be careful of my head!" Brittany said.
"rnngh- Sorry, Brittany! We're trying-" Elenor called up to her sister.
"Elenor, turn- Turn her to the left on this one!" Jeanette instructed.

The two of them were currently trying their best to get Brittany downstairs, sort of holding up their blob of a sister, their paws sinking into her soft flesh, as they lugged her down the stairs one after another, letting her sort of roll over and slowing her fall from step to step as best they could. It was a chore, to be sure, but they figured it'd all be worth it to get her closer to the food- so they wouldn't have to keep making return trips up and down the stairs. Even if it did mean trying to hold up a huge blob of smothering fat.

Soon enough, they did get her down to the bottom of the stairs, where it was much easier to move her around. Elenor and Jeanette standing side by side, pushing Brittany from behind- the rotund blob of a chipmunk sort of sliding along, sometimes getting caught a bit and doing an awkward sort of flop-roll over, her sisters careful to keep her head up, so it wouldn't be pinned underneath her.

"Hey Brittany, do you want us to put you on a chair in the kitchen, in front of the table, or on the couch in the living room?" Elenor asked, taking a break from moving her to step over in front of her face so she could ask where to put her next.

Brittany thought for a moment about where she'd like to be...the chair was in the kitchen, which obviously meant quicker food, but the couch was nice and soft, and in front of the TV. She answered...

choices: "I want breakfast food- Pancakes, waffles, bacon, sausages, and omelettes!"

1213111122212.content:
"Put me on the- bbRRUUUURRRRRrrp -couch." Brittany ordered, Jeanette recoiling slightly at her sudden belch. "And then turn on the TV! Make it something good."

Jeanette sighed, fixing her glasses. "Sure thing, princess." She said sarcastically, as she and Eleanor assumed their positions at Brittany's side, working together to roll the enormously obese chipmunk diva over to the sofa, pushing her squishy, flabby body up against the front of it- grunting and straining their muscles as they hoisted her up, lifting as hard as they could- eventually managing to get her onto the couch. Hopping up themselves, they adjusted her position slightly- So that she was sitting upright.

Brittany was so big she took up the whole center cushion of the couch, her face, forepaws, and pudgy little hindpaws poking out from her round body, suspended uselessly in lard. "She looks like a throw pillow..." Eleanor commented, before Jeanette shushed her.

The engorged Brittany gave a self satisfied sigh, as she allowed herself to settle comfortably into her doughy, tender, flabby frame. Even as her field of vision was framed by her own enormous cheeks, and she was looking over the horizon of her own chins at the TV (which Eleanor had turned on, trying to find a good channel for her swollen sister), Brittany's vanity still brought her willful ignorance of her own enormity. In her mind, she was still slim- In possession of the perfect figure, and a flawless metabolism. She was only making her sisters carry her because she didn't feel like walking, being too important and talented for such a task. Sure- her sisters were her co-stars, but she was the leader!

Eleanor settled on the food network, which was showing an array of cooking competitions. "Oooh- good choice." Brittany commented.

Eleanor giggled sweetly, looking up at her massively fat sister. "Thanks! I thought you'd like it, considering your...erhm...interest in food."

Brittany chuckled, licking her lips. "Well- it's definitely making me hungry!" Despite the gigantic quantity of food she'd recently consumed, she wanted more. The one thing on Brittany's mind was hedonism- She wanted to eat, lots! She wanted to taste a wide array of every flavor she could, savoring the sweetness of it all. She wanted to feel full, warm, comfy and cozy, all while never having to move a muscle. She deserved it, after all- being so amazing.

124331121.content:
It was a fine & sunny day for the Chipettes. They were practicing their singing skills for a song-contest. However...the one Chipette who stood out the most & the most talented singer, was Eleanor (the plump chipette). Her solo alone, was a highlight according to her fellow sisters, Brittany (the cool chipette) & Jeanette (the smart chipette).

One day, they got a letter with an advertisement poster of the contest.

Eleanor: ”Girls. Look what i found inside our mailbox!”

Brittany: ”Cool, let me see!”

It was a poster with some extra letters of how the contest will be. It was from the people who worked so hard for making the contest. Jeanette started to read.

Jeanette: (reading) ”Dear, Chipettes. We are gladly informing that one of you can be entering the annual singing contest for talented singers. (To her sisters) Girls. One of us might be in the contest.”

Brittany & Eleanor: (cheering) ”Who-hoo! Score one for us.

Then there were the conditions, Jeanette had to be aware of.

Jeanette: However.......(Brittany & Eleanor stopped cheering).....there are conditions.”

Jeanette kept reading.

Jeanette: (reads) ”1. The members have to be only solo-performers....which means: No fellow members to join in. 2. In order to have a powerful singing voice, you need to have a big deep voice to sound convincing.”

Brittany: (surprised) Big voice?? Where are we going to get a big voice. We don’t have anything like that....we’re rodents.

Jeanette: ”True. But which one of us will be competing?”

The Chipettes started to think...... and kept doing so.....until Eleanor stepped in to take it.

Eleanor: ”I’ll do it.”

Both Brittany & Jeanette were surprised.

Both: ”You’ll do it?”

Eleanor: ”Yeah, why not? I mean....i’m a very talented singer.”

Brittany: ”Cool. But there is one tiny problem. (stating the truth, sadly) You don’t have a big voice.”

Eleanor: (in her normal high-pitched voice) Well.....then I’ll try getting a big voice. Do you the any solutions, Jeanette....dear sister?

Took time for Jeanette to come up an idea....but then she got it.

Jeanette: ”Well.....i have read that a person’s vocal chords gets deeper, the more bigger he or she is. Which means you have to be big yourself to have a big voice.”

Eleanor: (surprised) ”You mean.......fatter?”

Jeanette: (nods yes) Exactly,”

Eleanor: ”But........ how will i get very big so fast before the contest?”

Brittany then thought up a brilliant idea.

Brittany: ”Oh, i think i have a solution to make you bigger, Eleanor.”

Brittany then used a phone to call for chocolate-service.

Brittany: ”Hello. I would like to order a large order of chocolate, right away.”

What happened then?

Someone who looked as heavy and gluttonous as the chipmunks themselves.
14412123111.content: The six chipmunks arrived at a nearby burger joint that they knew and loved for serving huge thick burger's, mountainous piles of French fries and large, thick shakes. When they arrived today however they noticed something interesting specifically...
14412123111.title: Fast food joint.

144121231112.content:
In other words a heavy huge completely fat handsome hunk and gluttonous yet friendly deer named Vincent who happened to be at a table as he was getting ready to eat a set of huge thick hamburgers along with a mountainous pile or two of french fries and supersized thick milkshakes.

"Huh I wonder who this guy is as we've never seen him before." Alvin said.

"Well perhaps he comes here often who knows?" Simon replied.

"After all for a guy his size he sure does have quite an appetite." Theodore said.

"You know he's rather handsome and quite a hunk." Brittany said.

"How this guy got huge and whatnot, I'll never know." Jeannette said.

"Apparently this guy's wearing a big enough kimono and wooden sandals as his hair style happens to be shaped like a topknot, maybe this guy's a sumo wrestler." Eleanor said.

"That sumo wrestler who's there at that table sitting by himself, you see he's a sumo wrestler who happens to be with the Toon Wrestling Entertainment organization as he happens to be a face wrestler that represents the organization's sumo wrestling division." One of the fast food restaurant's employees said.

"Is that so? The Toon Wrestling Entertainment organization yeah you know we've heard of that group apparently they're well known around the world, perhaps we could become wrestlers like Vincent." Alvin said.

info.brief_description: A weight gain story involving the Alvin and the Chipmunks and Chipettes
info.description:
I once saw an Alvin and the Chipmunks weight gain story...but it's gone now. So I decided to make it.

Some rules are:
-No killing off anyone
-Weight gain is the only thing allowed so far and must be the center of the story
-Adult themes allowed, but only to a certain extent

For those who can't remember who these guys are, go here: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Chipmunks

For those who simply wish to sample their music, go here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4_Wft5CqKUg
